query.statement:
SELECT E.PAPRYYYYMM, W.ZZACTSS, E.LIFNR, E.TEMNO , (SELECT N.DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.MANDT = E.MANDT AND N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.LANG = 'ko' AND N.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) AS TEMNM , (SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = E.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND MM028.LANG = 'ko' AND MM028.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS_NM , (SELECT DISTINCT NN.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0034 NN WHERE NN.MANDT = E.MANDT AND NN.LIFNR = E.LIFNR AND NN.GBN = 'A' AND (NN.SO = 'X' OR NN.SO3 = 'X')) AS LIFNRNM , 'ÆÀÀå' AS TEMNONM , (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 WHERE MANDT = E.MANDT AND TEMNO = E.TEMNO) AS NAMET2 , E.PERNO , E.NAMEE , COUNT(E.NAMEE) OVER (PARTITION BY E.PAPRYYYYMM, E.LIFNR, E.TEMNO ) AS CNT --°Ç¼ö FROM (
( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD0#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD0# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD1#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD1# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD2#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD2# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD3#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD3# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD4#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD4# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD5#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD5# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD6#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD6# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD7#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD7# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD8#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD8# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD9#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD9# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD10#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD10# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
UNION ALL ( SELECT MANDT, substr(#YYYYMMDD11#,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE FROM ( SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND ENTER <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE EXCEPT SELECT MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 WHERE 1=1 AND (RETID <= #YYYYMMDD11# AND RETID <> '00000000' AND RETID <> '') AND GBN = 'A' AND TYPE = '1' AND MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND TEMNO = #ZTEMNO#
AND LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND GUBUN = #CHK_GBN2#
GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, PERKEY, NAMEE ) GROUP BY MANDT, LIFNR, TEMNO, PERNO, NAMEE )
) AS E INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON E.MANDT = C.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON E.MANDT = W.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = W.LIFNR WHERE E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '' OR W.ZZACTSS != ' ') AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND E.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND E.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = E.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
